desc.p: This field is used to hold the transaction code which will be used on the entries produced for the cost of funds on the MI.COF.ENTRIES file to populate the credit transaction code field.
When the MI.AUTO.ENTRY records are created, this transaction should be used as the transaction code for the credit entry.
Must be a key to a valid record on the TRANSACTION file.
Mandatory.
System field indicating the last date on which the generation of MI.COF.ENTRIES (for this COF Type) for Account records on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file was run.
No input field.
The transaction code used for the crediting entry is defined in this field and will be used as the contents of the
TRANS.CODE.CR field on any MI.COF.ENTRIES records created with this MI.COF.TYPE.
Must be the key to a valid record on the TRANSACTION file.
Mandatory.
The transaction code used for the debiting entry is defined in this field and will be used as the contents of the TRANS.CODE.DR field on any MI.COF.ENTRIES records created with this MI.COF.TYPE.
Must be the key to a valid record on the TRANSACTION file.
Mandatory.
This field is used to hold the transaction code which will be used on the entries produced for the cost of funds on the MI.COF.ENTRIES file to populate the debit transaction code field.
When the MI.AUTO.ENTRY records are created, this transaction should be used as the transaction code for the debit entry.
Must be a key to a valid record on the TRANSACTION file.
Mandatory.
System field indicating the last date on which the generation of MI. COF.ENTRIES (for this COF Type) for Contract records on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file was run.
No input field.
The Description of the record is held in this field..
Upto 35 alphanumeric characters.
Mandatory.

This field is used to hold the Profit and Loss category which will be used on the cost of fund entries produced on the MI.COF.ENTRIES file for this cost type. This category should then be mapped, using the MI.AUTO.MAPPING application, to the PL.CATEGORY field on the resulting MI.AUTO.ENTRY records.
Must be the key to a valid record on the CATEGORY file.
Must be in the range 50000 to 69999.
Mandatory.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This key specifies the name for a Cost of Funds (other than refinancing) type.
Up to 16 Alphanumeric characters.
Description of the Cost of Funds type.
Mandatory
The entry type which will be assigned to the credit cost of funds entry on the MI.COF.ENTRIES file is held in this field
Must be the key to a valid record on the MI.ENTRY.TYPE.
Mandatory.
No change field.
The entry type which will be assigned to the debit cost of funds entry on the MI.COF.ENTRIES file is held in this field.
Must be the key to a valid record on the MI.ENTRY.TYPE.
Mandatory.
No change field.
Specifies the Type of the Cost of Funds.
Only value allowed is COST
No change field.
